entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
